enWisdom: Falsehood is the opposer of truth
Falsehood is a deceptive beguiler
Falsehood is the weakest supporter

Wisdom: التَّظَافُرُ [التَّظَفُّرُ] عَلَى نَصْرِ الْبَاطِلِ لُؤْمٌ وَخِيَانَةٌ
enWisdom: Collaborating in support of falsehood is vileness and treachery
One who helps falsehood has oppressed the truth
The aim of the falsifier is [to cause] corruption

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَنْفَصِلُ عَنِ الْبَاطِلِ مَنْ لَمْ يَتَّصِلْ بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: How can one separate from falsehood when he has not attached [himself] to the truth?
Falsehood has a [fixed] circuit

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَ غَرَضُهُ الْبَاطِلَ لَمْ يُدْرِكِ الْحَقَّ وَلَوْ كَانَ أَشْهَرَ مِنَ الشَّمْسِ
enWisdom: One whose goal is falsehood will not perceive the truth even if it is more manifest than the sun
How ugly falsehood is!
Falsehood [is like a mount that] makes its rider stumble
Falsehoods hurl one into deviations
One who embarks on falsehood, regrets
One who assists falsehood faces loss
One who supports falsehood, regrets
One who rides on falsehood, his mount will destroy him
One who embarks on falsehood, his feet will slip

Wisdom: مَنِ انْتَصَرَ بِأَعْدَاءِ اللَّهِ اسْتَحَقَّ الْخِذْلَانَ [اسْتَوْجَبَ الْخِذْلَانَ‏]
enWisdom: Whoever seeks support from the enemies of Allah deserves to be forsaken
The one who employs falsehood is chastised and condemned

Wisdom: لَا يَعِزُّ مَنْ لَجَأَ إِلَى الْبَاطِلِ
enWisdom: One who resorts to falsehood does not become powerful
